[b][b][b][color=#f1c232][size=5][About this mod]
[/size][/color][/b][/b][/b]□This MOD can introduce four followers
□They're at a Whiterun BanneredMare
□She is Essential
□She is strong
□Bodytype/UUNP:7b bombshell +Mens
□They can't get married.
□Fighting style
Mika/tank+Healer
Marl/ice magic
Kumu/Crossbow
Michelle/Barehanded + thunder magic

[b][color=#f1c232][size=5]Official DLC requirements[/size][/color][/b]
[b][size=5]Dawnguard[/size]
